      • getAction

        private void getAction()
                throws java.io.IOException
        This function uses the wikipedia strategy to take decisions it uses the player card and the server initial card to take the decision that why it saves the save card in the game. It wouldn't be necessary to do it if it wasn't by the function.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - error reading and writing in the socket
